body.name: Makeup Mirror with Lights, 8" Foldable Lighted Makeup Mirror for Travel, 46 LED Dimmable Portable Vanity Mirror with 3 Lighting Modes (Circular)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 2 mins
features: Portable Travel Vanity Mirror - The foldable mirror is 8-inch in size, and provides a big and high definition clarity wide-angle viewing, helping you achieve flawless professional makeup. Easily fold and put in a backpack or suitcase, you can also make up anytime while traveling

3 Light Colors and Dimmable - The makeup mirror is bright, helping you catch every tiny detail and create flawless makeup. 3 light colors (warm white, natural daylight, and cold white) help set the right tone for different occasions. If you want to have a professional exquisite makeup, the Brightown vanity mirror with lights is an ideal choice

Fast Charging and Long Lasting - Only 2-3 hours recharging for 7.5 hours operation, great for daily life operation. USB cable included, convenient to recharge this makeup mirror from the power bank and outlet. The indicator lights will flash red for recharging reminding, and turn green when fully charged

Adjustable - Adjust the angle to fit you best for comfortable makeup. The lighted makeup mirror is a gift idea for mother, sister, wife, girlfriend, birthday, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, anniversaries

Notice: The travel mirror with light is a single-sided mirror, not a double-sided mirror. We provide a foldable lighted makeup mirror sized 8 inches is 1X normal mirror, it comes with an additional smaller mirror sized 3 inches is 10X magnifying mirror. If you need a double-sided 1X/7X magnifying vanity mirror, please search B0BQYMS3XT. You can choose a suitable mirror for your daily life

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The package comes with a very small separate 10X magnifying mirror. It is suitable for the entire face makeup and closeup facial grooming.

Package Includes: We provide a foldable lighted makeup mirror sized 8 inches is 1X normal mirror, it comes with an additional smaller mirror sized 3 inches is 10X magnifying mirror, USB Type-C Charging Cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOLVED: Light not working after a little over a month.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: I believe the fact the light wasn’t working was a user error-ish. I used my Macbook charger thinking it was the same cord needed, but recently I plugged in and happened to notice there’s no charge indicator light. I switched to using the provided charging cable instead and charge indicator came on red, charged fully to green and now the light is brighter and there’s no issue with random shutting off. So, overall I’m VERY HAPPY with the mirror and very happy the light issue is “fixed.” My only feedback to anyone considering purchase is don’t expect to be able to connect with seller after your return window is up.ORIGINAL REVIEW:The mirror is PERFECT for small spaces! It unfolds to a good height to do makeup, and the lighting is better than expected. I LOVE that it is rechargeable. However, after 5 weeks the light randomly turns off between 10-30 second intervals. It’s pretty frustrating, as the mirror wasn’t cheap. The support website goes to a landing page. I’d really appreciate a replacement product, as I believe I got a defective one…here’s hoping the seller sees this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: Love this because it can be adjusted to a higher level to apply makeup. Light is great and also comes with a magnifying mirror to attach to the larger one. Perfect for travel as it’s very compact

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Very Giftable item!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for myself as a daily mirror because of lighting and vision problems. It is so neat! I love how small, light, and portable it is. The best part is how it unfolds to sit taller off of the counter if you are standing by the sink to get ready. Not too many travel mirrors do this. In fact uou have two different height positions and probably easy to hang up (though I haven't tried). The light settings and brightness work well for me. I want to gift it now to all my friends and family lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good customer service from seller
reviews.reviewText: My mirror suddenly stopped charging. The seller was prompt in helping me resolve the issue. The mirror itself is compact and designed well. Multi positions is a huge plus. It travels easily! Please note that it does not magnify. Lighting is jus ok and could be brighter but overall, I am satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for makeup!
reviews.reviewText: I had surgery on the side of my foot and the only way to reach the dressing area is to bend my leg and put the foot over my other thigh; the dressing area is then on the underside, where I can't directly see it!This round adjustable lighted mirror solved the issue - I place it on the floor and adjust the height and angle of the nice large mirror so I can see the underside of my foot in it. The lighting is a bonus. Now I can change the dressing on my own, no nurse needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Contact Lenses and Makeup
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mirror for my daughter to use when she put in her contact lenses. She has had some trouble adjusting to the process of doing that herself, and this mirror really was the key to helping her figure it out. It folds up flat when she isn't using it, so it doesn't waste room in our small house, but it is a nice large size for her to use when she needs it each morning. I think it will also be great for her to use when she starts wanting to wear makeup in a couple of years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mirror to put in and take out my contact lenses. It works great for that and I especially like that it folds flat. I take it with me when I'm away. The 3 different light settings are nice to have and it lasts a couple of weeks on a charge for the amount that I use it. Great mirror - definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but very dim lighting
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is aesthetically beautiful. I really like the white instead of the regular silver or gold material. I also like the 3 different colors of light and that the mirror will continuously flip and not be stopped to fli the other way. The only downfall of this mirror is the light is not bright at all. It’s hard to do makeup, tweeze brows and do skincare with the dim light. I might keep the light only because I like how it looks. I wish it had a feature to adjust the brightness.
